ygData.subject: Re: Quick question re: choices of primary & secondary w eapons
ygData.msgSnippet: It does a very nice job of slowing attack speed as well.  It acts like a combination ensnare/walking sleep.  I ve not touched largo s melodic binding since I
ygData.messageBody:
It does a very nice job of slowing attack speed as well. It acts like a
combination ensnare/walking sleep. I've not touched largo's melodic binding
since I got it, so I can't offer observations or comparisons of both of
these songs. However being on Rallos Zek, I would prefer the 1 target
feature of chains over the AE of binding. And like you said, it softens the
nasty reactions when a wizard gets a little too trigger happy. It also has
an extremely high hate value, parallel to Bellow from what I've witnessed.

Ka`Lend


> The problem with this (and I was doing it too) is that Chain
> just slows
> the mob's movement speed from what I can tell, not it's attack speed
> like Binding does. And it doesn't seem to slow the mob's
> movement speed
> that much until the mob is low on hp. It can help keep a very fast mob
